DOC.brief_summary: Stem cell mobilization procedures after chemotherapy and G-CSf performed at our Institution between 2002 and 2013 were reviewed in order to define prognostic factors for optimal harvest
DOC.brief_title: Peripheral Blood CD34-positive Cells Enumeration as Predictor of Stem Cell Harvest
DOC.criteria: Mobilization with chemotherapy and GCSF Years 20022013 mobilization with GCSF alone mobilization with plerixafor
